title: Chicken Pie
directions: Heat up the wok or a pan containing oil, add the grated ginger and the chopped garlic.
Continue with the chicken thighs cut into thin strips until they brown. Then add the vegetables cut in julienne (strips), they must be crunchy but cooked.
Spray with soy sauce, and a tablespoon of sugar.
Serve with the green onions and the sesame seeds.
